data.message: Great work Facebook. Keep it up. I am disgusted at all the negative comments. People can't help who they are, gay, straight or whatever. We are in 2013 people, not 200 Ad!!!

replies.message: I'm disgusted with your hopelessly misinformed self. And people can help it, if they were shown love as children.
lol wow andrew you make no sense at all haha i could laugh at how stupid you look...i pity people like you
Andrew- there have been people come from very loving families, and still turn out gay. How do you explain that?
andrew i think you probably win the all suckers comments on this post! man, people like you are just wrong!
I am quite sure my twin brother was shown as much love as I was, except by people like you of course !!
You can't use 2013 as an argument... So it was not right in 200 AD, and you would be agains it?
It blows my mind that some people still use that tired old saying in their attempt to justify their homophobia Eldon. You need a new catchphrase dude, you sound like my grandmother.
Well, regardless of whether they choose to be homosexual or not, it's not the being gay it's the act of having "sex" with someone of a like gender. Abstinence is allowed.
